title: How to Create Service & Location Pages That Rank for Local SEO
description:
Are you a local business looking to boost your SEO and attract more customers? In this video, I’ll walk you through how to create service and location pages that rank in search results and drive local leads.

📌 What You’ll Learn:
 • Why service and location pages are crucial for local SEO.
 • How to create a content strategy for your services and target locations.
 • Tips for analyzing competitors and building unique, optimized pages.
 • How to track and refine your pages for success.

Whether you’re an attorney, plumber, or any other local service provider, this step-by-step guide will help you dominate local search results!

Timestamps:

00:01 - Introduction: Why Service & Location Pages Matter
00:22 - Example: Ranking for “Car Accident Attorney Atlanta”
01:07 - Step 1: Creating a Location Page Content Strategy
02:13 - Example: Using a Spreadsheet to Map Services and Locations
02:56 - Structuring Your Pages: Main City Pages and Service Pages
03:30 - Step 2: Analyzing Competitors for
